venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
The Help is a big hit, and my friends have told me it's good. So let's get together and see it.

The plot (loosely): A recent college graduate (Emma Stone) returns home to Mississippi in the 1960s. She befriends her friend's black servants (including Viola Davis) and exposes the unwritten race rules in their society. Something like that.

Rather than meeting on a weekend, let's meet on a Tuesday night. The Blackstone Valley Cinema has $6 movies on Tuesdays. The movie is showing at 6:30, so plan to meet in the lobby at 6:00-ish. If you're going to be late, call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

Anyone who wants to can join me for drinks, food, and conversation after the show.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo, but with a goatee

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Help
